## Pack.get() method

Get a pack by id

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(packId: BigNumberish): Promise<PackMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description                 |
| --------- | ------------ | --------------------------- |
| packId    | BigNumberish | the id of the pack to fetch |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[PackMetadata](./sdk.packmetadata.md)&gt;

the pack metadata
